short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privacy-friendly alternatives to Google that don't track you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'NoMoreGoogle' extension for Chrome presents a curated list of privacy-centric alternatives to Google services, ensuring users can surf the web without the worry of being tracked. Whether you're searching for a more secure browser, a privacy-focused email service, or any other Google alternative, this extension has got you covered. We've designed it with simplicity and user-friendliness in mind, ensuring you have an easy time making the switch. Should you have feedback or suggestions, we're just an email away and would love to hear from you.
